document_data.name: Naerh
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Naerh''' was a member of the [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Council of Lords]] in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's desttruction.
document_data.Activities:
Naerh was an imbecile who obeyed any order from Lord [[Chess]], who in turn was a puppet for higher powers within Zhentil Keep. He was frightened of the [[Zhentarim]] since Lord Chess was appointed as watchlord of the Council in the {{YearlinkName|1334}}.

His estate was located in the central section of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] at the intersection of [[Flostren's Memory]] and [[Elephstron Way]].
